# XergioAleX.com

> Personal website and blog by Sergio Alexander Florez Galeano (XergioAleX).

## About

This is the personal website of Sergio Alexander Florez Galeano, known as XergioAleX. He is CTO and Cofounder at DailyBot (YC S21), a computer science engineer with an MSc in data science, entrepreneur, speaker, and technology enthusiast. The site features a blog with articles about technology, software development, entrepreneurship, and personal experiences. Available in English and Spanish.

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://site.xergioalex.com/)
- [Blog](https://site.xergioalex.com/blog/)
- [About](https://site.xergioalex.com/about/)
- [Contact](https://site.xergioalex.com/contact/)
- [Blog (Spanish)](https://site.xergioalex.com/es/blog/)
- [Home (Spanish)](https://site.xergioalex.com/es/)

## Content Topics

The blog covers:
- Technology and software development
- Entrepreneurship and startups
- Tech talks and community events
- Trading and algorithmic trading
- Personal experiences and reflections

## Languages

- English (default): https://site.xergioalex.com/
- Spanish: https://site.xergioalex.com/es/

## Feeds

- RSS: https://site.xergioalex.com/rss.xml
- Sitemap: https://site.xergioalex.com/sitemap-index.xml
